6400.name: A Mountain Trail
6400.description: This trail leads up, up, up into the mountains.  You hope you don't fall down, because that would hurt, hurt, hurt!  The trail continues to the east, and you can go back down to the small hidden valley to the west.

6401.name: A Mountain Trail
6401.description: You're really high up now.  You can keep going even farther up into the mountains to the east, or go back down to the west.

6402.name: A Mountain Trail
6402.description: Wispy clouds are beginning to surround you now, and your ears pop due to the altitude.  To the east, you see the summit of the mountain, and from the way the nearby mountains are arranged behind it, you believe you're on your way to a big valley.  You can also go down to the west.

6403.name: Near The Mountain's Peak
6403.description: The peak of this mountain is another couple hundred feet above you, but here is where the trail leads down into the valley...  What an odd valley!    The valley seems to have been filled up by a hundreds of feet of lava many years ago.  It gives the valley an odd, 'flat' look and darkish ground.  The path leads down east into the valley, and west back to civilization.

6404.name: The Trail To The Valley
6404.description: The trail leads down into the valley, where, by judging by the height of the trees, the lava had cooled tens of decades ago.  Down below you see the path lead into the small forest in the valley, and disappear out of sight.  East leads into the valley, West back to civilization.

6405.name: In The Valley
6405.description: The ground has taken on the texture of dirt on the top, but this valley is far too flat and too rocky to disguise the catastrophe that happened here so long ago.  Looking up to the mountains ringing this area, you notice several mountains look as if they had 'exploded', which is strange, considering that they are not volcanos.    The path leads into the woods to the east, and back up the mountain to the west.

6406.name: In A Clearing
6406.description: You come to a small clearing now, after walking for several minutes through the silent woods.  An odd block sticks up here and there in   the ground... wait a minute.  These stones seem a little too regular, and from the circle  formation and size you could almost swear that they were... crenellations?  Could some sort of building been buried by the lava here?  A rusty ring sticks out of the earth in the center... a trapdoor?  This is almost too good to be true!

down.description: An ancient trapdoor, grimed with earth and age.

6407.name: A Stairwell
6407.description: This small room is the top of a stairwell leading down deep into the tower.  A small trapdoor overhead leaks the light of day around its edges.  To the south is a  wooden door, preserved through the ages by means  unknown.  To the west is a short hall.

up.description: An ancient trapdoor, grimed with earth and age.

6408.name: A Linen Closet
6408.description: This small room holds many types of linen on shelves  along the walls.  They are undoubtedly preserved by magic against the toil of the ages, since they seem freshly washed and folded.  You wonder what sort of mage could wield so much power to waste on such little things.

6409.name: A Corridor
6409.description: This is only a clean corridor, that leads back to the  stairwell to the east, and has doors leading to other rooms to the north and south.

6410.name: A Bathroom
6410.description: This is some sort of bathroom, like you've never seen before...  Water appliances leading from nowhere deliver hot and cold running water to basins that drain to... where?  How strange!

6411.name: The Master Bedroom
6411.description: This is an opulent room, decorated in silks and gold. There is an ebony desk against one wall, cooled lava rock spilling over its surface from the window it once looked out at.  A nice, spacious closet is filled with clothes just cleaned and pressed.

6412.name: The Library
6412.description: A great mages' library is contained on this floor of  the tower.  You feel you could learn anything you wanted to if you only looked and read long enough.  A door opens up back on the stairwell to the east.

west.description: A big bookcase, that looks rather odd.

6413.name: The Stairwell
6413.description: This stairwell continues up and down, and there is a door to the west.

6414.name: A Hidden Hall
6414.description: This is a small hidden hall with a secret entrance to the library on the north end of the west wall, and a trapdoor  on the south end.

east.description: The backside of a movable bookcase.

6415.name: A Stairwell
6415.description: This stairwell continues up and down, and there is a door to the west opening up onto this level.

6416.name: The Hidden Treasure Room
6416.description: Jackpot!  A small room filled with treasure chests!  Go get them!

6417.name: A Hallway
6417.description: This hall runs through the tower.  There's more hall to the west, and doors to your north and south.  A door to the east leads back to the stairwell.

6418.name: A Servant's Room
6418.description: This seems to be a small servant's bedroom, sparsely decorated and outfitted with a bed, nightstand, chair and table, etc.  Nothing real important here.

6419.name: A Servant's Room
6419.description: This seems to be a small servant's bedroom, sparsely  decorated and outfitted with a bed, nightstand, chair and table, etc.  Nothing real important here.

6420.name: A Hallway
6420.description: This hallway continues to the east, and has a door to  the north.  You could swear that the way this level is arranged... nah, couldn't be.

6421.name: A Servant's Room
6421.description: This seems to be a small servant's bedroom, sparsely decorated and outfitted with a bed, nightstand, chair and a table, etc.  Nothing real important here.

6422.name: The Stairwell
6422.description: This stairwell leads up and down, and there is a big open room to your west.

6423.name: The Dining Hall
6423.description: This is a large dining hall, with a long table that runs down the length of it.  Chairs are set up along the sides to accomodate approximately 10 people.  There are paintings and tapestries on the walls, adding color to the stonework, The cooled lava that had poured in the windows makes the place  seem eerie somehow .  There is a door to the north, and the stairwell is to the east.

6424.name: The Kitchen Area
6424.description: This is a well-stocked kitchen, the larders still fresh and full as if by magic.  Perhaps this would be a good place to take a break.

6425.name: The Stairwell
6425.description: The stairwell leads up and down here, and there is a hall you can enter to the west.

6426.name: A Hall
6426.description: This area of the tower seems dank and oppressive.  The hall runs north-south, and there is an empty cell to your west.  The stairwell is to your east.

6427.name: A Hall
6427.description: This is the northern end of the hall.  There are cells to your right and left, empty and awaiting occupants.

6428.name: A Hall
6428.description: This is the southern end of the hall.  There are cells to your right and left, empty and awaiting occupants.

6429.name: A Stairwell
6429.description: The stairwell continues up and down here.  A large room opens up to the west.

6430.name: A Mage's Office
6430.description: A small desk here is cluttered with magically preserved papers and documents.  None seem of value, except perhaps to a historian.  This place seems vaguely uninteresting...

6431.name: The Stairwell
6431.description: The stairs go up and down here, and there is a room to the west...

6432.name: A Sitting Room
6432.description: This is a simply furnished room, with chairs all about. A fireplace is inset into an inner wall, the chimney undoubtedly directed by magic...    This would be a nice place to rest awhile...

6433.name: The Stairwell
6433.description: This is where the stairwell finally ends.  There is a hall to your west.

6434.name: A Hallway
6434.description: This small hallway on the former 'ground floor' ran north- south.  To the east is the stairwell that leads up into  the shadowy recesses of the tower.  To the west is the entrance way to the tower.  The north is completely blocked off by lava, and the way south is still clear.

6435.name: The Entranceway
6435.description: This is a grand chamber with giant double-doors to the west.  To the east is the main floor of the tower.  This room is arranged highly attractively and very impressively, with sculptures and tapistries everywhere.  The doors seem impenetrable... you don't think you'd be able to get through them if you really had to...

west.description: These doors seem incredible.  Unfortunately, they're locked.

6436.name: The Doorway
6436.description: This was the entrance to the tower.  Now lava has blocked it up completely.  However:    It seems when the lava came down a man was outside the doors.  He was blasted into the doors, and died instantly, but his skeleton still clutches a staff in perfect  condition...

east.description: These double doors have the outline of a man blasted into them...

6437.name: The Hallway
6437.description: This is the southern part of the hallway.  There is  a door to the west, barred with gleaming bands of lights. To the north is more hallway.

6438.name: The Stairs
6438.description: Stairs lead down here into the tower's basement, or you can head east into the main floor of the tower.

6439.name: The Stairs
6439.description: Stairs lead up here to the main level, or you can go east to the basement of the tower.

6440.name: An Alcove
6440.description: This alcove leads into a huge room to your north, and to stairs leading down to the east, and stairs going  up to your west.

6441.name: The Laboratory
6441.description: This laboratory has lots of stuff in it.  Beakers, flasks, burners, tongs, mortars and pestles, jars filled with normal things, jars filled with abnormal things, jars filled with things you'd rather not think about... A search could reveal many things...

extra_descs: mortar mortars pestle pestles jar jars

6442.name: The Stairs
6442.description: Stairs lead down here to the second level of the basement, or back west to the alcove.

6443.name: The Stairs
6443.description: Stairs lead up here to the first level of the basement, or you can go east to another big room.

6444.name: The Summoning Room
6444.description: This room is darkly lit by a giant glowing pentagram in the center of the room.  Bands of force encircle some sort of being trapped inside.  You think that going inside would be an EXTREMELY BAD idea...

6445.name: Inside A Pentagram
6445.description: The small god entrapped by the wizard looks at you with an insane expression.  Four hundred years of imprisonment doesn't do much for one's...     OOPS!     He killed you!    You are dead, R.I.P.

6400.name: goat
6400.long_desc: A mountain goat nibbles at a piece of grass here.
6400.description:
This goat is acclimated to the rugged terrain of the 
mountains.  It looks at you and shies away a little.

6401.name: demon
6401.long_desc: A cloaked and clawed demon of decay comes at you viciously!
6401.description:
This demon has pure malevolence for anything living.  
Oops!  You're living!  I guess that means you!

6402.name: book
6402.long_desc: A mound of books rise up into a human shape and tries to hit you!
6402.description:
Ironically enough, the book-monster's head is War and
Peace.  Hmm.

6403.name: bad
6403.long_desc: A bad feeling chokes your throat.
6403.description:
It resembles a lot of other bad feelings you've had,
but a lot more tangible... magic?

6404.name: nightmare
6404.long_desc: Your worst nightmare coalesces in front of you and attacks!
6404.description:
It looks like you deepest, darkest fears personified.
Wait a minute!  It IS your deepest, darkest fears
personified!

6405.name: guardian
6405.long_desc: A guardian guards the door.  It looks at you and attacks!
6405.description:
The guardian guards the door.  That's about all its
brain can handle: guarding.

6401.name: platemail
6401.room_desc: Some glowing platemail lies in a heap here.

6404.name: sculpture
6404.room_desc: A nice piece of sculpture is here.

6405.name: vial
6405.room_desc: A small vial filled with a red fluid lies in the dust here.

6406.name: amulet
6406.room_desc: An odd looking amulet has been discarded here.

6407.name: pole
6407.room_desc: A tent pole has been tossed away here.

6408.name: bag
6408.short_desc: a bag of powder of wealth
6408.room_desc: A small bag filled with powder of wealth lies here.

6409.name: desk
6409.room_desc: There is an ebony desk here.

6410.name: book
6410.room_desc: A book with a title written in moving letters rests here.

6412.name: lens
6412.room_desc: A smoky lens about a foot around has been scuffled in the dirt here.

6413.name: mevais
6413.room_desc: A small black leaf of a mevais plant lies here, well preserved.

6414.name: bottle
6414.room_desc: There is a bottle of a milky fluid here.

6415.name: staff
6415.room_desc: There is a metal-shod staff here.

6416.name: chest
6416.room_desc: There is a wooden chest here.

6417.name: chest
6417.room_desc: There is a wooden chest here.

6418.name: chest
6418.room_desc: There is a wooden chest here.

6419.name: basin
6419.room_desc: A basin filled with crisp, clean water is here.
